RiskDescription: Construction pricing is PARAMETRIC only -- no vendor quotes. Actual costs could vary +/-30-50% from the $10.729M estimate.
Mitigation: Obtain vendor quotes and sub-trade pricing before proposal submission

RiskDescription: Professional hourly rates are market estimates. Actual firm rates may differ by +/-20-30%.
Mitigation: Replace with actual firm billing rates when available

RiskDescription: OI-004 (FF&E treatment) still formally OPEN. If resolved differently from $20k allowance; Schedule A/B structure changes.
Mitigation: Resolve OI-004 before finalizing PKG-02 estimates

RiskDescription: Bond/insurance rates are market estimates. CCIP rate (2.0%) has LOW confidence.
Mitigation: Obtain actual surety and insurance quotes

RiskDescription: Proposal preparation timeline (6 weeks per PP-04) may force compressed parallel effort; increasing coordination overhead not captured in LOE.
Mitigation: Monitor timeline and add coordination premium if compressed

RiskDescription: Reference documents flagged as inaccessible in Dependencies.csv. If permanently unavailable; some narratives proceed with assumptions and gaps.
Mitigation: Obtain reference documents before production begins

RiskDescription: Schedule dependent on construction methodology (DEL-04-01) which is co-developed -- circular dependency may cause iteration.
Mitigation: Coordinate DEL-08-01 and DEL-04-01 production in parallel with explicit reconciliation point
